LanguageData.Gun_PowerAssaultShotgun.label: power assault shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_PowerAssaultShotgun.description: A shotgun powered by powershards. Deadly and fast firing.
LanguageData.Gun_PowerGatlingGun.label: power gatling gun
LanguageData.Gun_PowerGatlingGun.description: A massive gatling gun powered by powershards. Throws a ton of rounds down range. It is low damage but very high firerate.
LanguageData.Gun_PowerSniperRifle.label: power sniper rifle
LanguageData.Gun_PowerSniperRifle.description: A sniper rifle powered by powershards. Shoots 2 powerful rounds in short succesion.
